attributes.name: Dark Path
attributes.description: "This sword was cast aside for greater power…and greater corruption."
attributes.parsed_description: "This sword was cast aside for greater power…and greater corruption."

attributes.name: Dark Phoenix
attributes.description: "To prosper in this realm of men is wickedness in the eyes of the damned."
attributes.parsed_description: "To prosper in this realm of men is wickedness in the eyes of the damned."

attributes.name: Dark Pyromancer's Spellstaff
attributes.description: "The coven's pyromancers were among the most powerful beings on Aeternum, controlling forces that were not meant to be controlled."
attributes.parsed_description: "The coven's pyromancers were among the most powerful beings on Aeternum, controlling forces that were not meant to be controlled."

attributes.name: Dark Quandary
attributes.description: "If your opponent falls in a forest, and no one is around to hear it, did they really die?"
attributes.parsed_description: "If your opponent falls in a forest, and no one is around to hear it, did they really die?"

attributes.name: Darkseer's Maul
attributes.description: "The Corrupted darkseer wielded this hammer for a generation, reaving death and darkness upon all who might cross her path."
attributes.parsed_description: "The Corrupted darkseer wielded this hammer for a generation, reaving death and darkness upon all who might cross her path."

attributes.name: Dark Sky
attributes.description: "When they came, they brought with them an eternal darkness. We never saw the light again."
attributes.parsed_description: "When they came, they brought with them an eternal darkness. We never saw the light again."

attributes.name: Dark Tidings
attributes.description: "There is trouble brewing on the horizon. I can smell it on the wind."
attributes.parsed_description: "There is trouble brewing on the horizon. I can smell it on the wind."

attributes.name: Dark Widow
attributes.description: "The hooded figure appeared as if out of nowhere. They raised their axe and struck silently and viciously. Dark magic poured from the wound and flowed towards the axe."
attributes.parsed_description: "The hooded figure appeared as if out of nowhere. They raised their axe and struck silently and viciously. Dark magic poured from the wound and flowed towards the axe."

attributes.name: Davey Jones's Staff
attributes.description: "We are all reborn in the depths of the sea."
attributes.parsed_description: "We are all reborn in the depths of the sea."

attributes.name: Davy Jones' Musket
attributes.description: "Before coming here I would have called this gun a fairy tale come to life. Now it seems practically mundane."
attributes.parsed_description: "Before coming here I would have called this gun a fairy tale come to life. Now it seems practically mundane."

attributes.name: Deadsight
attributes.description: "Look down the barrel and never miss a shot."
attributes.parsed_description: "Look down the barrel and never miss a shot."

attributes.name: Dead Silence
attributes.description: "Sometimes the best shield is to not say anything at all."
attributes.parsed_description: "Sometimes the best shield is to not say anything at all."

attributes.name: Deal with the Devil
attributes.description: "Forged in Hell itself, this axe promises immense power at the price of one's soul."
attributes.parsed_description: "Forged in Hell itself, this axe promises immense power at the price of one's soul."

attributes.name: Death Rattle
attributes.description: "For there is no thief or serpent who shall not bear my name."
attributes.parsed_description: "For there is no thief or serpent who shall not bear my name."

attributes.name: Debug Imbue
attributes.description: USE: Functional Imbue for Debugging. Lasts 60 seconds. 10 uses.
attributes.parsed_description: USE: Functional Imbue for Debugging. Lasts 60 seconds. 10 uses.

attributes.name: Decay
attributes.description: "When I have siphoned the soul from your body you shall be a feast for the worms."
attributes.parsed_description: "When I have siphoned the soul from your body you shall be a feast for the worms."

attributes.name: Deceit of the Defiler
attributes.description: "She double crossed us and burned our ships, a deception we never saw coming."
attributes.parsed_description: "She double crossed us and burned our ships, a deception we never saw coming."

attributes.name: Decisive Victory
attributes.description: "One shot to the head and the battle was over."
attributes.parsed_description: "One shot to the head and the battle was over."

attributes.name: Decorative Longbow
attributes.description: "This belongs on a mantle."
attributes.parsed_description: "This belongs on a mantle."

attributes.name: Decorative Rapier
attributes.description: "Not overly sharp and not particularly well balanced. But it'll do in a pinch."
attributes.parsed_description: "Not overly sharp and not particularly well balanced. But it'll do in a pinch."

attributes.name: Decrepit
attributes.description: "Eventually, everything withers into nothing."
attributes.parsed_description: "Eventually, everything withers into nothing."

attributes.name: Deep Hatred
attributes.description: "I will find you, and I will end you."
attributes.parsed_description: "I will find you, and I will end you."
